Summary: looked like a pill shaped craft
divs: Sighting DetailsMy name is Christine Fitch.I am writing this for my husband Mark,because he and my grandaughter seen this thing this morning.My husband is working alot of hours at work.He told me this morning he and our grandaughter were outside in our driveway exactly between 8:00-8:30 am.She was playing in his truck while My husband was standing outside of the truck.He just happened to look up in the sky when he seen this flying craft.He said it made no sound,and was going real slow.It came from the north heading south.He said it looked like a moving pill in the air.Our grandaughter said it looked like it had a red stripe on it,She also drew a picture of it.Well while my husband was watching it,all of a sudden it vanished in front of there eyes.My husband was in dis belief of what he just seen.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Walbridge
This sighting has never been favorited.
